short_summary: Request for Proposal - Supply of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints as detailed at Annex A Statement of Requirement.
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paint
### Solicitation Number: W8486-249098/A

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints to be delivered to various locations. The tender follows the solicitation number W8486-249098/A.

#### Tender Details

* Solicitation number: W8486-249098/A
* Tender amendments: 5
* Tender publication date: May 2, 2023
* Tender closing date: May 31, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Expected contract start date: May 29, 2023
* Expected contract end date: June 29, 2023
* Tender status: Expired

#### Supply and Delivery

CARC Paints will be delivered to the following locations:

* 202 Workshop
	+ 6769 Notre Dame E, Montreal, QC H1N 3R9
* EFD CIS, bldg. 301
	+ 195 Ave & Provost PL, Edmonton, AB T5J 4J5
* 25 CF Supply Depot Montreal
	+ Montreal, QC H1N 3V9

#### Inquiries and Communication

All inquiries and other communications concerning this Request for Proposal must be sent in writing only to the contracting authority named in the Request for Proposal.

#### Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Attachment

[Available on CanadaBuys](https://... pdf, https://... pdf, https://... pdf, https://... pdf)

#### Contact Information

* Julianne Eng
* julianne.eng@forces.gc.ca
* (343) 572-5275

#### Important Notice

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price.

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity

This contract is for global delivery. 

(Note: I have reformatted the text to the markdown format with proper keywords and header titles. I also fixed the incorrect country abbreviation for Montreal which is Quebec, not Alberta)
